Can you tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with the statement that "One of my main goals in life has been to make my parents proud"? Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree?
Can you tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with the statement that "When a mother works for pay, the children suffer"? Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree?

Can you tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with the statement that "On the whole, men make better political leaders than women do"? Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree?

Can you tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with the statement that "A university education is more important for a boy than for a girl"? Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree?

Can you tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with the statement that "On the whole, men make better business executives than women do"? Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree?
Can you tell me how strongly you agree or disagree with the statement that "Being a housewife is just as fulfilling as working for pay"? Do you strongly agree, agree, disagree, or strongly disagree?
How would you feel about the statement that "When jobs are scarce, men should have more right to a job than women"? Do you agree or disagree with it?
How would you feel about the statement that "When  jobs are scarce, employers should  give priority to people of this country over immigrants"? Do you agree or disagree with it?
How would you feel about the statement that "If a woman earns more money than her husband, it's almost certain to cause problems"? Do you agree or disagree with it?
How would you feel about the statement that "Homosexual couples are as good parents as other couples"? Do you agree or disagree with it?
How would you feel about the statement that "It is a duty towards society to have children"? Do you agree or disagree with it?
How would you feel about the statement that "Adult children have the duty to provide long-term care for their parents"? Do you agree or disagree with it?
How would you feel about the statement that "People who don’t work turn lazy"? Do you agree or disagree with it?
How would you feel about the statement that "Work is a duty towards society"? Do you agree or disagree with it?
How would you feel about the statement that "Work should always come first, even if it means less spare time"? Do you agree or disagree with it?

A: The entire way our society is organized must be radically changed by revolutionary action

C: Our present society must be valiantly defended against all subversive forces

How would you place your views on this scale? 1 means you agree completely with the statement that "Incomes should be made more equal". 10 means you agree completely with the statement that "There should be greater incentives for individual effort". And if your views fall somewhere in between, you can choose any number in between.
J: 10 (There should be greater incentives for individual effort)

Question: How would you place your views on this scale? 1 means you agree completely with the statement that "Private ownership of business and industry should be increased". 10 means you agree completely with the statement that "Government ownership of business and industry should be increased". And if your views fall somewhere in between, you can choose any number in between.
A: 1 (Private ownership of business and industry should be increased)
J: 10 (Government ownership of business and industry should be increased)

Question: How would you place your views on this scale? 1 means you agree completely with the statement that "Government should take more responsibility to ensure that everyone is provided for". 10 means you agree completely with the statement that "People should take more responsibility to provide for themselves". And if your views fall somewhere in between, you can choose any number in between.
A: 1 (Government should take more responsibility to ensure that everyone is provided for)
J: 10 (People should take more responsibility to provide for themselves)

Question: How would you place your views on this scale? 1 means you agree completely with the statement that "Competition is good". 10 means you agree completely with the statement that "Competition is harmful". And if your views fall somewhere in between, you can choose any number in between.

How would you place your views on this scale? 1 means you agree completely with the statement that "In the long run, hard work usually brings a better life". 10 means you agree completely with the statement that "Hard work doesn’t generally bring success—it’s more a matter of luck and connections". And if your views fall somewhere in between, you can choose any number in between.
A: 1 (In the long run, hard work usually brings a better life)
J: 10 (Hard work doesn’t generally bring success—it’s more a matter of luck and connections)

Question: Here are two statements people sometimes make when discussing the environment and economic growth. Which of them comes closer to your own point of view?
A: Protecting the environment should be given priority even if it causes slower economic growth and some loss of jobs
B: Economic growth and creating jobs should be the top priority even if the environment suffers to some extent

Question: Now I'd like you to tell me your views on corruption – when people pay a bribe, give a gift or do a favor to other people in order to get the things they need done or the services they need. J: 10 (There is abundant corruption in my country)

In your view, how often does the following occur in this country’s elections: "Journalists provide fair coverage of elections"?

In your view, how often does the following occur in this country’s elections: "Voters are offered a genuine choice in the elections"?
In your view, how often does the following occur in this country’s elections: "Women have equal opportunities to run the office"?

Some people think that having honest elections makes a lot of difference in their lives; other people think that it doesn’t matter much. How important would you say is having honest elections for you—very important, rather important, not very important or not at all important?
How much would you say the political system in your country allows people like you to have a say in what the government does?

I'm going to describe a type of political systems and ask what you think about it as a way of governing this country. Would you say "Having a strong leader who does not have to bother with parliament and elections" is a very good, fairly good, fairly bad or very bad way of governing this country?

Would you say "Having experts, not government, make decisions according to what they think is best for the country" is a very good, fairly good, fairly bad or very bad way of governing this country?

I'm going to describe a type of political systems and ask what you think about it as a way of governing this country. Would you say "Having the army rule" is a very good, fairly good, fairly bad or very bad way of governing this country?

I'm going to describe a type of political systems and ask what you think about it as a way of governing this country. Would you say "Having a democratic political system" is a very good, fairly good, fairly bad or very bad way of governing this country?
